title: Build More Efficient Windows Store Apps Using JavaScript: Performance
blurb: This article examines several techniques for improving a Windows Store app's performance, focusing on memory usage and HTML UI responsiveness.

title: Build More Efficient Windows Store Apps Using JavaScript: Error Handling
blurb: This article looks at best practices for error handling using the Windows Library for JavaScript (WinJS).

title: Exploring the JavaScript API for Office: Data Binding and Custom XML Parts
blurb: This article examines key aspects of the API, focusing on data binding and support for working with custom XML parts.

title: Exploring the JavaScript API for Office: Data Access and Events
blurb: This article provides a detailed walk-through on how to access file content and a review of the event model.

title: Exploring the New JavaScript API for Office (Part 1)
blurb: This article is the first in a series of in-depth looks at the JavaScript API for Office, introduced in Microsoft Office 2013.
